column2: 你的血液被纯净液体所取代。
你受伤时会流出盐，平时能够缓慢地吸收附近的液体，并减少一点受到伤害。
在你面前生成一些随机物品和药水！
大多数附近的敌人尸体都被转化为黄金。
你融化附近的冰和其他寒冷的物质，并且免疫冻结。
你手持的魔杖属性略有提高。
增加最大生命值的红心也会治愈你。
在一个关卡杀死足够多的敌人后，你会在圣山获得额外奖励。
你获得了一件可以安抚元素的神器。
您找到红心或稀有宝箱的机会将大大增加。
你在受到伤害时释放出冰冷的投射物。
你获得随机的免疫效果，当你过于混乱时效果可能会改变。
根据你拥有一次性天赋的数量提升你魔杖的法力恢复速度。
你的下一局游戏将以+50最大生命值和一个额外天赋开始，但在本局游戏当你的生命值低于20%时你会立即死亡。
你觉得与世界上的机器人有某种亲缘关系。
你有机会规避重大伤害。
当敌人近距离攻击你时，你们之间会产生一次电击，你获得近战免疫。
你将获得5分钟的随时修改魔杖，时间结束之后会获得随机奖励。
你留下了有用的球体，这些球体可以在你已经去过的地方加速你的移动。
此后圣山中的红心只给你所需要的恢复量，你可以一点一点的使用。
当第一次进入一个区域时，你会获得短暂的无敌效果。
一个不专业的幽灵会助你一臂之力，你的瞄准不会在醉酒时受到干扰。
如果些许驻足，便可以感觉到一些隐藏在世界各地的秘密。
如果些许驻足，便可以感受到更多隐藏在世界各地的秘密。
你受到的投射物伤害减少75%，但受到的其他种类伤害加倍。
任何生命值低于10%的敌人都会立即死亡。
在此后的圣山中你能获得额外的天赋，但是你会受到可怕的诅咒......
你获得三个可以反射敌人远程伤害的眼球。
你感到无法抑制的愤怒！
你感觉自己更强了！你受到的伤害减少20%。
你觉得很贪心！拾取金块将获得双倍的黄金。
你感到精力充沛！你受到的伤害增加20%。
你感到快乐 你受到的伤害减少33%。
在一段时间内你可以随时随地编辑魔杖。
这个区域感觉很熟悉......你的移动速度得到了提升！
你感觉被净化了。当你的健康状况越高时，你受到的伤害会越少。
你感到非常混乱。你的头好像在旋转......
你保护了附近的生物，但你的生命正在流失！
你的头脑非常清晰。\n你的免疫效果被禁用......暂时。
你的胃在翻滚......你的移动速度变慢了。
治愈并增加最大生命值$0
你能听到里面充满恶意并饱含科技感的嗡嗡声。
它发出令人兴奋的温暖。你觉得它好像有保护你的意愿。
陨石坑中散发出的不祥红光。
可以扔出去召唤一个保护性的钢制拱顶
一团能产生魅惑效果的雾气
凭空产生一滴纯净液体
凭空产生一滴毒性淤泥
为你制作一杯美味的咖啡！
令投射物周围的材料腐蚀和老化
令投射物周围的火转化为水
释放一个位置固定的蓝色球体，一段时间后会施放另一个法术
弱小但带有迷人闪烁的投射物？
将小范围内的一切转化为冰，包括墙壁、生物……还有你
减少释放延迟并恢复一点法力
增加投射物的治疗属性和投射物伤害，并允许投射物击中自己
大大降低投射物的暴击几率，但增加其伤害
魅惑气体组成的扩散之环
狂暴气体组成的扩散之环
暗淡的酸液或暗淡的熔岩组成的扩散之环，会破坏环境但不会伤害生物
可靠的上方护盾，保护你免受投射物伤害
可靠的上方护盾？保护你免受投射物伤害
一个神奇的魔弹，可以让你向前传送一小段距离，虽然它可能会让你感到恶心......
向投射物添加少量的多种类型伤害
将热浪天赋的弱化版应用到你的魔杖
将冰冻领域天赋的弱化版应用到你的魔杖
将粉末消融天赋的弱化版应用到你的魔杖
将吸金大法天赋的弱化版应用到你的魔杖
将雷电之体天赋的弱化版应用到你的魔杖
将不再击退天赋的弱化版应用到你的魔杖
将点尸成金天赋的弱化版应用到你的魔杖
切换条件法术的红色和蓝色状态
切换条件法术的绿色和黄色状态
禁用所有切换条件法术，直到施放另一个切换器
如果切换器的值未设置为蓝色，则跳过下一个法术
如果切换器的值未设置为红色，则跳过下一个法术
如果切换器的值未设置为绿色，则跳过下一个法术
如果切换器的值未设置为黄色，则跳过下一个法术
不够准确的投射物，能够造成火焰、雷电和绿毒伤害
令四个不祥之球围绕一个投射物旋转
你的魔杖不断流出鲜血
一个奇怪的魔弹，不喜欢墙壁和干净的东西
一个由纯金制成的致密球体
创造一个无害的球体，在短时间内提升你的移动速度
破坏性的光束会在你和投射物之间延伸
一支空灵的魔法箭，可以穿过墙壁
一支空灵的魔法箭，可以穿过墙壁，在和敌人碰撞时施放另一个法术
一支空灵的魔法箭，可以穿过墙壁，在定时结束后施放另一个法术
投射物没有初始速度，不受重力影响
一个充满神秘液体的彩色弹跳球体
来自邪恶之地的单向传送门
使一个敌人消耗其生命值以保护附近的生物
一个闪闪发光、不受重力影响且有弹性的投射物
一种痛苦的令血液沸腾的喷雾
向你的敌人扔一个易爆的炸药桶！
以丧失20%最大生命值的代价生成一个元素石（必须有200最大生命值或更多）
令投射物周围的的任何粉末转化成不祥气体
对命中的实体施加虚弱效果的神圣子弹。小心，可能适得其反！

The preservation of technology is an important art, that relatively few seem to practice.
We mortals are fallible things, and memories go forgotten over time more often than not.
Therefore, I shall do my part in the preservation of technology old and new. But where to begin...?
Ah. Our Gods, and their gifts to us... some have been lost over time. Why or how or when, it is all unknown.
Perhaps these gifts, and their associated magicks, can be rediscovered somehow.
Tributes to the gods, in the form of feats to accomplish... Yes, I am certain this will work.
Dear reader, stay with me a moment longer. These gifts may be unearthed yet.
- Robin, the scholar

All scholars have work that they abandon.
Many materials are merely lost to time due to lack of interest.
That strange orange liquid, intoxicating to the touch... Where did it come from?
Made from pain and confusion and toxic waste, it seems to be full of potential.
It can convert diamond to gold, or snow to that which is pure.
It seems even whiskey and vomit have a purpose with this remarkable liquid.
Even the Gods' Brickwork and our Guns' bullets are overtaken by such a material.
But as with all things which seem to have potential...
Fire consumes it all the same.
I suppose all of us have our weaknesses.
- Robin, the scholar

Certain magical liquids can take over one's body and make them do horrible things they otherwise would not.
Many have been killed by those they trust due to Berserkium's malicious magic.
Worm blood is often ingested intentionally to help with the sight of its bearer.
Combined with sand, one can make a delightful delicacy.
Berserkium can also be combined with corpses to make a beverage straight from Hell itself.
And, of course, fungus can cause strange effects, especially when combined with polymorphine...
- Robin, the scholar

I've found it! The Gods have answered my prayers, and they've told me what I must do...
However, I lack the power to do so myself, and their hints are undecipherable to me. Ahem...
'Find yourself immune to the wizards that render their foes helpless.'
'Accept 3 Gifts from the Gods that provide no permanent benefit.'
'Live on the bleeding edge of death, and defeat foes while doing so.'
'Venture into the most ominous cave in this Land, and seek True Knowledge within.'
'Find and use one of the lost Experimental Wands.'
And, finally... 'Travel to the center of the lost cube of Water.'
I couldn't know what these hints mean. But, perhaps...
Someone far in the future will discover my notes, and unlock this potential themselves.
- Robin, the scholar

And, lo! The spell is cast, history prewritten rewritten. 
These damned spiders with the thousands of teeth...  their hunger insatiable, unless...?
I pacified them for my own survival, using a spell taught to me long ago.
However, such a force cannot be created or destroyed... only moved, redeveloped.
I have sealed their willpower in this very book. Such a power could be devastating or divine.
I leave that fate up to the Gods, or to you, curious reader...?
Perhaps the Gods would enjoy this tribute of willpower as a gift...?
- Robin, the scholar

I had been storing items in my treasure chest... Gold, potions, food...
I turned away, and heard a nasty chomp noise from behind me...
I swear I saw... teeth. And, when I opened the chest again... all the food was gone.
Is there something living in my storage? Or is it the chest itself...?
- Robin, the scholar

Oh, what a cozy little place! This liquid feels cool to the touch, but pleasantly so, almost like mint.
I had a small taste... It's good. Very good.
I'm half-tempted to settle down here... but, no. My exploration must continue.
I'll bottle some of this liquid for later, and leave the rest for someone else.
...Will anyone else be alive to find it?
- Robin, the scholar

I'm running out of time. The Gods do not listen to my prayers anymore. Why is this?
I ask them for more... more knowledge, more health, more time.
My body creaks and aches... I am growing too old to bear.
I don't understand. Have they given up on me?
Perhaps I have become too greedy. I am only human.
I will repent for you, my Gods...
I just need more time.
- Robin, the scholar

The small moon
The malevolent eye
The versatile, pulsing elemental stone
The Anvil calls to all of them.
你感觉对火的抗性更高了......
你感觉对爆炸的抗性更高了......
你感觉对雷电的抗性更高了......
你感觉对毒液的抗性更高了......
你感觉对冰冻的抗性更高了......
你感觉对窒息的抗性更高了......
你感觉对近战的抗性更高了......
什么也没有变。你觉得魔法好像已经消失了。
您的法力充能速度提高了！
亵渎神明的变形艺术在呼唤你......
作为饥饿的主人，你让自己喜欢上了饥饿......
你突然意识到你财富的新用途......
充满恶意的技术在你手中感觉更自然了......
你感觉更愿意适应你的环境......
你感觉你的贪婪瞬间超越了你......
你的好奇心得到了回报......！？
饥饿假装微笑。很高兴你又召唤了它。
你已经将这个世界拱手相让于饥饿，并让它前往下一个......
屠杀的感觉很令人满意......！
你暂时无敌了！这太疯狂了！
你暂时无敌了！杀 杀 杀！
你知道该做什么 - 去找他们！
好好利用你的无敌！摆脱你的烦恼！
你是无敌的！跳入酸液或熔岩中！不过要小心变形魔药。
这是一些无敌帧。 希望它们能让你活着！
无敌！这是给你的，我的朋友！
嘿，你正在探索许多地方！做的不错。给你一些无敌效果。
我已经要用完无敌的近义词了。
你暂时无敌了！......现在的你还需要它吗？
你暂时无敌了！我要开始重复我的台词了。
当你捡起心时会召唤一些临时机器人与你并肩作战！
在此后的圣山中你能获得额外的天赋，但是你会受到可怕的诅咒......
当生命值低于10%时你会立即死亡，但你会以+50最大生命值和额外的天赋开始下一局游戏。
你可以清楚地看清你周围的一大片区域，并且不会失明。
法术刷新器有机率产生几个随机法术，而不是刷新你的法术次数。
如果你的生命值低于20%，你的投射物会暂时迷惑敌人。
召唤一只友好的可骑乘蜘蛛来帮助你。
在魔杖附近踢击会立即取出魔杖中的所有的法术。
当敌人死亡时它们现有的投射物会变成友方的投射物。
当站立不动时，你可以支付黄金来召唤一个可投掷的水晶球。
当拿着瓶子时添加一个吸管让你可以在更远的距离收集材料！
由其他敌人造成的另一个敌人死亡视作技巧击杀并获得双倍金币。
所有魔杖的容量都会随机增加或减少最多4个，忽略魔杖容量上限。
你的法术仓库中的所有法术都会被复制，但你必须再次购买所有法术！
发射投射物时可能会同时发射一枚变形魔弹。
立即为魔杖增加240点法力，但暂时减少60最大法力值
一种奇怪的花，会让敌人混淆朋友和敌人
造成大量伤害但无法杀死敌人的投射物
召唤一个强大的石球，可以将你装入其中
一种无伤害的带有追踪效果的投射物，会造成点燃效果
为你提供临时的泡沫盔甲，阻止点燃和绿毒对你造成伤害
投射物会使敌人在一段时间内被削弱并减少造成的伤害
一种带刺的投射物，可将击中的敌人固定在原地
在碰撞时释放另一法术的带刺投射物，可将击中的敌人固定在原地
将投射物产生的粒子效果替换为金色
当你点击右键时，切换条件法术的红色和蓝色状态
当你点击右键时，切换条件法术的绿色和黄色状态
当你点击右键时，禁用所有切换条件法术，直到施放另一个切换器
一个闪亮的气泡，与施法者的位置相呼应
魔杖上每有一个被动法术，该魔杖的法力恢复速度就会加快10%
如果你的魔杖上有4种或更多不同类型的法术，魔杖充能时间减少0.50
如果投射物下方有敌人它会迅速下落
如果魔杖的投射物数量多于修正，则减少充能时间；否则，增加暴击几率
由八个不同部分组成的能量护盾
投射物的轨迹和其他效果产生的材料变为两倍
如果这根魔杖的法力值达到最大，则提高你的移动速度
如果这根魔杖的法力值未达到最大，则提高你的移动速度
释放一个位置固定且会随时间增长的蓝色球体
在定时结束后释放另一法术的位置固定且会随时间增长的蓝色球体
投掷一个随附加的伤害大小而改变气体云扩散范围的烧瓶
一个巨大的炸弹，但只有当你离开其爆炸半径时才会引爆
令投射物击中沾有绿色毒液的敌人时暴击率+100%
创建一片寒冷的云并降下冰雹
线性瞄准敌人的雷电飞镖
召唤一个会跟随你并阻挡投射物的笨拙无人机
召唤一个会跟随你并攻击敌人的笨拙无人机
召唤一个会跟随你并帮助盟友的笨拙无人机
我是一个比较弱小的神。一个早已被遗忘的神。
我对这个世界的影响力正在减弱。
请...表现出你对我的信任。
如果你给我带来一份礼物......我就能重新获得一些与这个世界的联系。
你将会得到丰厚的回报。
拿着这个奇怪的绿色蛋会让你起鸡皮疙瘩。
这块光滑的石头让你感觉在它的影响下变得更干净。

A little spider has been trapped inside of this egg for some time now... I fear it may be too weak to hatch.
I tried cracking it with my hands, and a rock, and other things...
but I fear the little friend inside would get shaken up too much if I did.
I would go to the Gods for help, but... they do not seem to favour me lately.
Dear reader... if you find this book, may you ask our Gods for help?
Even if it's just a little spider... it hurts to see it stuck like this. Don't you feel the same?
- Robin, the scholar
它散发着空灵的光芒。将它扔向敌人可造成大量伤害！
棉花糖的味道温暖你的心。
它发出微弱的嗡嗡声，准备再次起飞。
Do you have perks that rely on luck?\nLucky Clover may help you with those, too...
Creepy Polymorphine can be frozen using toxic sludge.\nBe careful not to unfreeze it!
How does a ghost get tipsy?\nDon't think about it too much.

Remember the theme of three.
Normal, Chaotic, Unstable.
Normal, Giga, Omega.
Nature, Technology, Magic...
Can you find more?
Don't trust the Mini and Bloody treasure chests too much.\nChomp!
Try clicking and dragging an item out of your inventory.\nIf you hit an enemy with it, it will always cause a trick kill.
Propane tanks deal more damage than nukes.\nMaybe Exploding Corpses is worth taking after all.
Look at what you've done.\nYou broke Mana Heart.\nI hope you're happy.
If you kick at the perfect time, you can reflect melee damage.\nYou've probably done it by accident before.
Life Lottery can't be affected by Lucky Clover...\nBut it can be affected by the Curse of Greed.
You can use Kickstraction to steal spells from Holy Mountain wands.\nThough, the Gods may not appreciate such a display...
Not everything is a hint.\nOr, at least, this isn't.
Try combining Heat Wave and Freeze Field. You can pretend like you're ice skating.
Unlockable perks are marked by a blue border.\nIn total, there are 8 of them.\nHow many have you unlocked?
Four thousand years before\nThe Snake saw it all.
In the deepest reaches of Hell...\nIn the highest peak of the Sky...\nYou can find cats.
Zap Tap can block any damage type if you're close enough, not just melee.\nYou'll take some electricity damage as recoil, though!
Chaotic Transmutation has some magical properties...\nTry applying it to plasma or a large sawblade.\nOr use it on Rollout.
Egg in the sky\nEgg in the blood\nEgg in the lava.
At 18 stacks of Fortune Teller, summoning a crystal ball costs just 1 gold!\nAt 3,340 stacks, it becomes completely free!\nPlease don't ever try this.
The explosive damage dealt by a Crystal Ball is equal to 25% of your max HP!
Most 'Circle of' spells cannot have their lifetime increased.\nDon't try to increase the lifetime of any Touch Of spells, either.

FEED THE HUNGER
FEED THE HUNGER
FEED THE HUNGER
FEED THE HUNGER
FEED THE HUNGER
If you haven't already, you should try learning some glyphs!\nFor example, the glyph resembling a small square or a diamond is E.\nTry to see if you can spot it in messages.
Coffee pairs very well with Mystery Fungus.\nTry both Worm Blood + Sand and Sand + Fungus Blood + Toxic Sludge if you want to indulge!
Modifiers can't be applied to the beam of plasma spells.\nYou can apply them to the emitter, however.
Craving a more fancy meal?\nCombine cooked meat with diamond or honey to get a unique material!\nOr just rob a potion-throwing alchemist.
It glows ethereally. Throw it at an enemy to deal heavy damage!
November 11th is a very special day...\nTwo unique materials can show up in potions on that day!\nIn any run, Transmutatium has a rare chance of showing up in a normal potion!
Viscous Liquid has a purely unpleasant texture that makes it feel awful to touch.\nHowever, it has a very satisfying flavour...
Mundanium has many uses. Even if it tastes like oatmeal...\nIt can convert both toxic sludge and swamp into more of itself.\nOr, Flummoxium can be used with it to make Hastium.
Melee Immunity will help against the Hunger...\nBut it won't be enough.
Very rarely, IOU can give you another IOU!\nOr IOU can give you Gamble, which can give you IOU, which can...
The kill requirements of Bloody Bonus can be lowered by collecting certain perks.\nAngry Ghost, Vampirism, More Blood, or More Hatred.\n...But is it worth it?
Fill the skull's eye with water.\nFill the island's cave with blood.
Plasma beams with homing applied can kill almost anything.\nBut that spoils the fun, doesn't it?
There are 6 new unique wands to find throughout the world.\nHave you found them all?\nSacrifice them to the Gods for some spells!
Some breadcrumbs are projectiles.\nSome breadcrumbs are not.
Greed will destroy you in the end.
你做得很好，未来的知者。
到达这里并不是一件容易的事。你很清楚这一点。
整个世界都是为你而存在，你可以自由地做任何你想做的事。
但你仍然前进。 一如既往。
整个世界都属于你。而你还不满意？
不，你当然不满足。我也这么觉得。
幸运的是，我还准备了另一个奖励。
那么，领取你真正的奖励吧。
将附近的一个随机敌人被完全移除

Heya, Graham here! Just wanted to let you know:
Graham's Things relies on some modding functions that currently only exist in the beta branch of Noita.
Some stuff (namely, Creepy Polymorphine) won't function properly without these functions.
If you're on the Steam version, switching over to the beta branch of Noita would probably make your experience better.
If not, that's fine too. You can have fun with this big book instead.
Once Noita updates so that these functions are on the main branch, this book will go away forever.
How sad...
一段时间内，你完全不会被沾湿。

Robin was never one to give up. And what an end they eventually came to because of it.
As a child, they often were praised and rewarded for their perseverance.
As an adult, they were scolded and dismissed for their stubbornness.
Two words for the same phenomenon, I suppose.
Somehow, they got stuck on the idea of being 'crowned' by their god.
A divine way to show that Robin was truly the best, the strongest, the smartest.
Of course... they weren't any of those things. Not even close. I think Robin knew it too.

Somehow, I ended up becoming friends with them at a young age.
They were more talented than me at almost everything, to my disgruntlement.
Shockingly, our friendship persevered for several years after we had left school,
until it eventually broke apart... no thanks to Robin's own stubborn nature.
I kept hearing stories of Robin and their awful arrogant schemes, but I still held some respect for them.
It seems so stupid now... the petty little things that I cared about back then.

One day, Robin suddenly went missing. A week went by... I convinced myself that it was some sort of publicity stunt.
I went to their house to visit them, to scold them. 'They must just be laying low for a while, to make people curious,' I thought.
I assumed they would pop out after a month or two, tell some grand tale about where they were, and be the town favourite again.
But they never came back. I went to their home, but the only thing that remained was a pile of smoldering ashes.

It seems that they intended to leave everything behind. I scoured the area, tried to find anything that could prove that they had once lived here.
There was nothing. It was as if they had never existed at all. Except for, of course, those in the village who mourned.
Every day they cried, talked about Robin, prayed to the Gods for support.
I became even more isolated.
Nothing seemed to make sense anymore. This person, this friend that I had long since abandoned...
Why were they still influencing me so much, even now?

In our youth, Robin and I had traveled often throughout our village and the land surrounding it.
But there was one place that we never had ventured.
A cave entrance, boarded up and plastered with warning signs about dangerous monsters.
Lost in scattered thoughts, I traveled there, to the spot where we had sat outside and fantasized for hours about what could lie inside.
Except this time, the boards were gone. Ripped off and thrown to the ground, alongside a lighter and a small notebook.

The notebook's pages were both charred and wet - it had rained shortly after Robin burned it, I suppose.
The text was completely incomprehensible, but I recognized their handwriting.
I sighed, took out my travel backpack, and sat down in a clearing nearby.
When nightfall came, I lit a campfire and ate from my bag, keeping one eye on the cave entrance at all times.
Robin was still in there. And I was not going to leave until they came back out.

And so I waited, for what seemed like weeks. One day, as my food was running low, they emerged.
Bloody and bruised, they dragged behind them the corpse of a giant spider.
They looked horribly thin - evidently, there wasn't much food in that cave to begin with.
The most surprising thing: they didn't seem to notice me at all.
They kept their head low as they slowly trudged past, dragging the body behind them.
Down the road they traveled, towards our humble little town.
What the hell were they doing?

They spoke to themselves loudly as they walked. They seemed to be on the verge of insanity - which didn't quite surprise me.
They were finally going to be worthy, loved by all, crowned...
It was sickening to see. They had left so much behind.
I followed them to the middle of the town. People watched in horror... some cried out.
'Was that Robin?! Back after all this time?!'
They kept going, further, further... to the altar in the middle of the town.
They laid down the corpse on the altar, dropped to their knees, and looked to the sky in prayer.
